  • Method Details

    • exerciseLesson

      @GetMapping("/course/{lessonId}/exercise/review") public String exerciseLesson(@PathVariable("lessonId") int lessonId, @AuthenticationPrincipal UserSecurityDetails userDetails, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles GET requests to display the next exercise for review within a lesson.
      Parameters:
      lessonId - the ID of the lesson to get the exercise from
      userDetails - the authenticated user details
      model - the model to pass data to the view
      Returns:
      the name of the exercise view page, or error page if exercise not found

    • exerciseLessonReview

      @PostMapping("/course/exercise/review") public String exerciseLessonReview(@AuthenticationPrincipal UserSecurityDetails userDetails, @RequestParam("exerciseId") int exerciseId, @RequestParam("answerId") int answerId, org.springframework.ui.Model model) throws ExerciseNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException
      Handles POST requests when a user submits an answer for an exercise review.
      Parameters:
      userDetails - the authenticated user details
      exerciseId - the ID of the exercise being answered
      answerId - the ID of the selected answer option
      model - the model to pass data to the view
      Returns:
      the name of the exercise view page showing if the answer was correct or not
      Throws:
      ExerciseNotFoundException - if the exercise is not found
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found

    • exerciseLessonEvaluate

      @PostMapping("/course/exercise/evaluate") public String exerciseLessonEvaluate(@AuthenticationPrincipal UserSecurityDetails userDetails, @RequestParam("exerciseId") int exerciseId, @RequestParam("evaluation") ExerciseDifficult evaluation) throws ExerciseNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException, PublicUserLessonException
      Handles POST requests to evaluate the user's difficulty rating for an exercise.
      Parameters:
      userDetails - the authenticated user details
      exerciseId - the ID of the exercise being evaluated
      evaluation - the difficulty rating provided by the user
      Returns:
      a redirect to the lesson page if average rate >= 80, otherwise to the exercise review page
      Throws:
      ExerciseNotFoundException - if the exercise is not found
      UserNotFoundException - if the user is not found
      PublicUserLessonException - if the publicUserLesson is not found

    • exerciseLesson

      @GetMapping("/exercise/review") public String exerciseLesson(@AuthenticationPrincipal UserSecurityDetails userDetails, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles GET requests to show the next exercise for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      userDetails - the authenticated user details
      model - the model to add attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the exercise page view, or error page if no exercise is found

    • exerciseReview

      @PostMapping("/exercise/review") public String exerciseReview(@AuthenticationPrincipal UserSecurityDetails userDetails, @RequestParam("exerciseId") int exerciseId, @RequestParam("answerId") int answerId, org.springframework.ui.Model model) throws ExerciseNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException
      Handles POST requests when a user submits an answer to an exercise.
      Parameters:
      userDetails - the authenticated user details
      exerciseId - the ID of the exercise being answered
      answerId - the ID of the selected answer option
      model - the model to add attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the exercise page view with feedback on the answer
      Throws:
      ExerciseNotFoundException - if the exercise cannot be found
      UserNotFoundException - if the user cannot be found

    • exerciseEvaluate

      @PostMapping("/exercise/evaluate") public String exerciseEvaluate(@AuthenticationPrincipal UserSecurityDetails userDetails, @RequestParam("exerciseId") int exerciseId, @RequestParam("evaluation") ExerciseDifficult evaluation) throws ExerciseNotFoundException, UserNotFoundException
      Handles POST requests to evaluate the user's difficulty rating for an exercise.
      Parameters:
      userDetails - the authenticated user details
      exerciseId - the ID of the exercise being evaluated
      evaluation - the difficulty rating provided by the user
      Returns:
      a redirect to the exercise review page
      Throws:
      ExerciseNotFoundException - if the exercise cannot be found
      UserNotFoundException - if the user cannot be found
